thread.title: Tiffany
thread.title_full: R&G Brenner Income Tax reviewed by Tiffany

author: Tiffany
title: Tiffany
text: I like getting my ataxes done by R&G Brenner and I think they have skilled professionals that know how to get the job done; however I don't like the system. I called to make an appointment which they accepted and when I got there I had to wait over an hour because people that came in ahead of me signed in first. It needs to be a better system. If it's only a walk-in place then that should be told to the customers so there won't be any mixups. Other then that two thumbs up
